name: Aussie Lotto
short_description:
Aussie Lotto is a simple application to make creating numbers for lottery games, and checking results easier.  This program allows you to automatically generate numbers for a variety of Lotto games which are available in Australia.  You can save the games, add further your own selected numbers and check them against the results of the draw, instantly finding out what games you've won without having to
first check the ticket yourself, or take it to be scanned.  This is ideal if you want to play the same numbers again and again, and want
to check easily.
summary: Aussit Lotto is tattslotto game player and checker for Australia.
